text: Carmen Silvera (3 June 1922 â€“ 3 August 2002) was a Canadian-born British comic actress. She played Camilla Hope in the soap opera Compact. She also played Mrs. Van Schuyler in Lillie in 1978. Silvera was born in Toronto, Canada. She died from lung cancer at age 80 in England. Category:English television actors Category:1922 births Category:2002 deaths
title: Carmen Silvera
